code: import React,{useState}from'react';import NewNote from'./NewNote.js';import NoteList from'./NoteList';import'./Home.css';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faPenToSquare}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const[active,setActive]=useState("Home");const renderContent=()=>{if(active==="Home"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NoteList,{});}else if(active==="NewNote"){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NewNote,{});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigation,{active:active,setActive:setActive})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{children:renderContent()})]});}const Navigation=_ref=>{let{active,setActive}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:"flex"},className:"container mx-auto p-4 bg-white bg-opacity-80 rounded-lg shadow-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/public/images/logo.png",style:{width:'32px',height:'32px',marginRight:'10px',marginTop:'5px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"TheraPrompt"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",className:active==="NewNote"?"active":"",onClick:()=>active==="NewNote"?setActive("Home"):setActive("NewNote"),style:{color:active==="NewNote"?'#007bff':'#000000',textDecoration:'none',display:'flex',alignItems:'center',marginLeft:'10px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faPenToSquare})})]})});};export default Home;
